ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
800 g chicken breasts, skinless, cut in cubes (4 cm)
2 - 3 pinches ground black pepper, to taste
480 g tinned cannellini beans, drained (2 x 400 g tins)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place oil, onions, carrots, garlic and basil in mixing bowl, chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>, then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add tomatoes and wine then cook <b>5 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken breast fillets, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add cannellini beans, mix with spatula and cook <b>3 min/100°C//speed <b>. Check chicken is thoroughly cooked then serve hot, garnished with reserved grated Parmesan and basil leaves.
